body.p: New hardware in new design for Genesi's PPC machines with Gentoo preinstalled, a fresh experimental MIPS LiveCD for SGI machines, and a release of a WYSIWYG editor for Gentoo documentation: this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter starts with several announcements for things that have just been made available. Perl developer Michael Cummings, community talk sniplets, press clippings, international news and the usual security and statistics section round off this edition of your GWN. Have fun reading!
